channel.title: canada on Natasha's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in canada on Natasha's Journey

item.title: Мы получили PR!
item.description: Hello everyone! It’s been a while since I last wrote, and that’s because having a little one at home makes maintaining a full-fledged blog quite difficult. Plus, there weren’t many updates to share. But today, I’m finally writing this post as a permanent resident of Canada! Yes, it finally happened—we got PR. I’m incredibly happy to write this post! Whee, just two more years and we can finally apply for citizenship.
